wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Derek Maurice Jackson  (1918–2005) was a British paediatrician, recognised for his pioneering work in the management of cystic fibrosis.

response: *Sir Anthony Jackson (soldier) (1599–1666), English lawyer, soldier and knight
*Anthony Jackson (paediatrician) (1918–2005), British paediatrician, pioneer in the management of cystic fibrosis
